body.joined_squad_text: You have successfully joined the squad
body.excited_text: We’re excited to have you on board!

body.check_squad_dashboard_text: Check the squad dashboard for more details.

body.consequences_squad_text: You’ll no longer see new content from this squad, and members of the squad won’t be able to interact with you there.
body.if_mistake_text: If this was a mistake, you can rejoin the squad anytime using a valid invite link (if available).
body.thank_you_text: Thanks for being part of the Squad community,

body.no_action_required: No action is required from you.
